parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

datasetStructure: One record per planned Element per Arm

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TA.STUDYID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TA.DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TA.ARMCD

datasetVariables.description: Short name of a specific ARM (may be up to 20 characters) used for sorting and programming. Should be populated in Demographics when Arms have been defined in this domain.
datasetVariables.label: Planned Arm Code
datasetVariables.name: ARMCD

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TA.ARM

datasetVariables.description: Descriptive name given to a specific Trial Arm (e.g., Low Dose, Mid Dose, 10 mg/kg/day dose).
datasetVariables.label: Description of Planned Arm
datasetVariables.name: ARM

modelDatasetVariable.title: Planned Order of Element within Arm

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TA.TAETORD

datasetVariables.description: Number that provides the order of the planned Element within the Arm. This value should be an integer.
datasetVariables.label: Order of Element within Arm
datasetVariables.name: TAETORD

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TA.ETCD

datasetVariables.description: ETCD (the companion to ELEMENT) is limited to 8 characters and does not have special character restrictions.
datasetVariables.label: Element Code
datasetVariables.name: ETCD

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TA.ELEMENT

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TA.TABRANCH

datasetVariables.description: Conditions subjects meet, occurring at the end of an Element, which cause an Arm to branch off from other Arms (e.g., randomization to control group).
datasetVariables.label: Branch
datasetVariables.name: TABRANCH

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TA.TATRANS

datasetVariables.description: If the study design allows for a subject to transition to an Element other than the next sequential Element, as defined by TAETORD, then the conditions for transitioning to those other Elements, as well as the alternative Element sequences, are specified in this rule (e.g., TATRANS = 'Subject with Hypoactivity Transitions to Rest Period to Treatment 2').
datasetVariables.label: Transition Rule
datasetVariables.name: TATRANS

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TA.EPOCH

datasetVariables.description: Name of the study Epoch with which this Element of the Arm is associated (e.g., Treatment, Screen). Equivalent to 'Phase' or 'Period.'
datasetVariables.label: Trial Epoch
datasetVariables.name: EPOCH

description: A trial design domain that contains each planned arm in the trial. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, SDOMAIN, C49618, 2018-06-29)
label: Trial Arms
name: TA
